message: This is a fantastic opportunity to own a product that will bring you immense value. It's priced competitively, and I assure you it will meet your expectations. Are you ready to seize this chance?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but without knowing the true quality of the product, I'm not willing to take the risk. I'll wait for more information or a better opportunity.

While it may not be the 'best' in terms of quality, it could still offer an interesting experience.  I'm willing to offer you a chance to assess its value for yourself.
